name: SpaceRunner (Crossedkiller)
description:
Hello everyone! SpaceRunner, an infinite shoot-em-up, is very simple, but extremely difficult to master!

I created this game to learn how to make games and to learn coding. It was done in Unity with C# and took me 11 days to learn and make. Biggest shout-out to Wayfarer Games and to the amazing GDB Discord for all the help provided and teaching in order to make this possible.

Really hope you enjoy this game. I will appreciate any feedback or comments.

Also feel free to follow me on Twitter or to visit my website!
